cab.content: From :- General Delme Radeliffe, Italy. To :- C.I.G.S.," War Office;Banned, in 12,40 s.t,m*))22/12/17 Received' 5C30 a.in, )10063 December 21st evening,5rd Army, Normal, except that enemy medium and light-artillery persistently shelled 8th Corps front.4th Army, It is reported Italians do not held summit of Asolone but that enemy is also unable to occupy itc Considerable artillery activity on this front but no infantry action reportedc At dawn December 21st hostile surprise attack Solarclo Valderva position repulsed,1st Army, Nothing of importance to report6Of numerous enemy aeroplanes which flew over first Army front two were brought down. Considerable movements of transport and troops behind enemy;s lines on 1st and 4th Army fronts. Snow began to fall on the mountains about 1 p.m. to-day.
